Rick Scott brags about Florida's declining unemployment rate

   The competitive businessman in Gov.

Florida ranks last in the nation when it comes to long-term unemployment,
   so economists say the shrinking labor force is a natural result.

The shrinking workforce can be attributed to a number of factors, but the
   fact that Florida is last in the nation when it comes to long-term
   unemployment can’t be ignored.
